items.headline: ‘Rocky IV’ star Dolph Lundgren shares the money mistake that made him more hands-on with his finances
items.summary_en: The Swedish-born actor, who played the boxer Ivan Drago in ‘Rocky IV,’ has now gone into the vodka-making business and taken a more hands-on approach with his finances.

items.headline: Free returns are not a given anymore, as retailers deal with rising costs
items.summary_en: A surge in product returns seen through the pandemic is leveling off as retailers’ generous return policies have become “harder to sustain,” a new report says.

items.headline: Concerns about banks’ credit exposure help power latest leg of bond-market rally
items.summary_en: The 10-year Treasury yield briefly fell to its lowest intraday level since April on Friday, as traders assessed the potential for a deeper push below 4% on any further fallout from bad loans in the banking industry.

items.headline: Fifth Third Bank’s message on credit jitters: There’s nothing to worry about
items.summary_en: The regional bank’s stock bounced as its earnings beat expectations and provisions for credit losses were less than feared.

items.headline: This government shutdown could be the longest ever — maybe running until Thanksgiving. What might the economic damage be?

items.headline: Can’t invest in SpaceX? Investors can buy this stock instead.
items.summary_en: SpaceX may be the highest-profile name in the space industry, but analysts say launch rival Rocket Lab Corp. provides an alternative for investors who wish they could invest in Elon Musk’s privately held company.
